author: Fred Imbert
title: Here's what happened to the stock market on Monday
description: Equities remained in a tight range for most of Monday's session as investors awaited key U.S.-China trade talks.
content:
Dow Jones Industrial Average falls 95 points
The Dow fell 95.70 points, or 0.36% to close at 26,478.02. The S&P 500 slipped 0.45% to close at 2,938.79. The Nasdaq Composite pulled back 0.33% to end the day at 7,956.29. Stocks traded in a tight range for … [+1433 chars]
